definition: a section or portion of a journey or course
details:
noun
- a section or portion of a journey or course
= synonyms: stage
- the nautical distance traveled by a sailing vessel on a single tack
= example: the nautical distance traveled by a sailing vessel on a single tack
- a cloth covering consisting of the part of a pair of trousers that covers a person's leg
- one of the supports for a piece of furniture
- a prosthesis that replaces a missing leg
= synonyms: peg, wooden leg, pegleg
- a human limb
= synonyms: arm
- a structure in animals that is similar to a human leg and used for locomotion
- the limb of an animal used for food
- a part of a forked or branching shape
= synonyms: ramification, branch
